channel.title: Need help with server!
channel.description: ok, first, how do i make it so people can choose how their character looks on startup? second, how do i change where people can and can't pk? and last, how do i change my server from operating on 0.0.0.0 to operating on the ip i want? any help would be very much appreciated

item.title: Need help with server!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

0.0.0.0 is default in your router rule just open port: 43594 and for the IP put 1.1.1.1 schedule: always and thats about it and for the other things you asked…there are exact tuts on how to do those things.

Read full topic
